name: ColorBind
description:
/!\ You should play in full screen for it to work /!\

ColorBind is a puzzle game about cubes of colors bound together by the colors they contain. Switch between colors to control every cube containing it to reach each level's goals with the correct cubes. There are 16 levels with increasing difficulties, where the last levels will see you controlling 5 cubes at once to succeed.

This game was made for the GMTK GameJam 2021 where the theme was "Joined Together". This was a wonderful experience and it allowed me to complete my first game. Thanks Mark Brown for this opportunity !
